original_text: The other events in Jotham’s reign, including all his wars and the other things he did, are written in the book of the kings of Israel and Judah.
korean_text: 요담의 남은 사적과 그의 모든 전쟁과 행위는 이스라엘과 유다 열왕기에 기록되니라

sentences.original_text: The other events in Jotham's reign
sentences.korean_translation: 요탐 왕의 통치 기간 중 다른 사건들은

sentences.original_text: and the other things he did
of the kings of Israel and Judah
